schedule-page.title: Professionals' Schedule
schedule-page.no-professionals-title: You don't have any professionals yet
schedule-page.no-professionals-description: Create a professional to be able to access your schedule

blocker-dialog.day-of-week-title: Select the days of the week
blocker-dialog.delete-msg: Are you sure you want to delete this block?

new-appointment.client-view-help:
Registered: Clients who are already registered 

 Guest: Clients who prefer not to create an account 

 New: Clients for whom you will create a new user.
new-appointment.no-time-msg: No available time slots on this date!
new-appointment.select-service-msg: Select a service to find available booking times

appointment-detailed.cancel-msg: Are you sure you want to cancel this appointment?

config-services.description: Here you will be able to add, edit, enable and disable services of your estabilishment.

config-payments.description: Here you will be able to add, edit and delete payments in your estabilishment.
config-payments.confirm-delete-description: Are you sure you want to delete this payment?

address.title: Address
address.description: Here you will be able to add, edit and delete your estabilishment's address

contact.title: Telephone
contact.description: Here you will be able to add, edit and delete your estabilishment's telephone

config-business-hours.title: Business Hours
config-business-hours.description: Manage your estabilishment's business hours. These business hours will directly impact the availability of slots for future client bookings.

config-brand.title: Brand and Visuals
config-brand.description: Manage your estabilishment's brand. Here you will be able to add your logo, name and images.
config-brand.name: Name
config-brand.confirm-delete-description: Are you sure you want to delete this image?

barbers.description: Here you will be able to add, edit and delete employees of your estabilishment.

add-new-barber.title: Add a new employee
add-new-barber.toggle-user-label: Add my user as a Professional

barbers.confirm-delete-description: Are you sure you want to delete this employee?

clients.description: Here you will be able to list your clients from your estabilishment

barbershop-comissions.description: Here you can easily and accurately calculate the amount to be received by an employee, considering the period you select.
barbershop-comissions.no-comissions: There's no comissions for selected dates!

success-modal.title: Registration completed successfully
success-modal.description: To start using all the features of CleverSlot and secure your free month, add a payment method. After the free period, continue for just €4.90 per month, depending on the plan you choose. It's fast, secure and you can cancel at any time!

header.welcome-description: The ideal online scheduling solution for your business.
header.trial-offer: Try it free for 1 month. After that, continue using it from just €4.90 per month, depending on the plan you choose.

simplified-scheduling.text: Quickly and efficiently organize schedules, reducing conflicts.

access-anywhere.text: Manage your schedule from any device.

boost-business.text: Let your customers book services directly without calls.

automatic-notifications.text: Receive reminders and keep your team informed about appointments.

financial-control.text: Find out how much to pay each collaborator.

for-all-businesses.text: Ideal for salons, barbershops, spas, and more.

step-1.title: 1. Create your account
step-1.description: In just a few minutes, you’ll be ready to start.

step-2.title: 2. Add a payment method
step-2.description: First month free, then from €4.90 per month, depending on the plan.

errors.already-has-organization: You already have or are part of an organization. To create a new one, register a new account.

success.title: Subscription Successful!
success.thank-you: Thank you for subscribing to CleverSlot! Your payment has been successfully processed.
success.full-access: Enjoy full access to all features. We're excited to have you on board!

failed.title: Subscription Failed
failed.message: We're sorry, but we couldn't process your subscription.
failed.check-payment: Please check your payment details or try again later.
failed.contact-support: If the issue persists, feel free to contact our support team.

plan.title: Subscription Plan
plan.description: Empower your business with our tailored plan designed to support growth and success.
plan.manage-professionals: Create and manage up to 5 professionals

billing.title: Manage Your Billing
billing.description: Access your billing portal to update your payment methods, review invoices, and manage your subscription with ease.
